name: Ocean Shores Convention Center
address: 120 West Chance a La Mer Northwest, Ocean Shores WA, 98569
vaccines: Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info: This clinic is held within the Ocean Shores Convention center. This clinic is for adults 18 years and older. This is a 2nd dose clinic for the Pfizer BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine AND the Moderna COVID-19 vaccine. Please bring a face covering to your appointment that covers the nose and the mouth and if you are getting your second dose, please bring your vaccination card. If you cannot locate your vaccine card, proof of first vaccination and type of vaccine must be provided. All persons receiving the vaccine are required to stay under observation for 15-30 minutes post-vaccination.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Packwood Flea Market Johnson & Johnson Clinic
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
****This is primarily a JOHNSON & JOHNSON single dose vaccine clinic. **** and is by appointment or walk in. ++Moderna and Pfizer vaccine will also be available in limited quantities ++ However, any 1st Dose Moderna or Pfizer clients will need to seek their 2nd dose in 28 or 21 days respectively with an alternate provider/clinic.                                                                                          
Please note: Johnson & Johnson and Moderna vaccine can only be administered to individuals 18 years of age or older according CDC requirements. Minors aged 12 to 17 are now eligible to receive Pfizer vaccinations with a parent present.

This clinic is located at and hosted by Packwood Senior Center during the 2021 Packwood Flea Market in partnership with Lewis County DPHSS, WA DOH and WA National Guard. This is a walk up location. Please let us know if you or someone you are accompanying needs assistance of any kind.  **You should also plan your visit around waiting for 15 minutes in the observation area so we can monitor for any unlikely adverse reactions to the vaccine.** Certain people with pre-identified conditions or past anaphylaxis events may be asked to wait for 30 minutes of observation.

Free language translation services are provided. Video ASL translation is also provided.

If this is your 2nd dose Moderna or Pfizer vaccination please bring your vaccination card from your 1st dose visit. If you do not have your card you may register with and confirm proof of vaccination at https://wa.myir.net/                      
 Please do not come if you are feeling ill. Please arrive as close as possible to your scheduled time to prevent crowding that will impede appropriate social distancing. - It is best to wear clothes that will allow for access to your upper arm, just below the shoulder.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Southwest Washington Fairgrounds
info: COVID-19 Moderna Vaccine. Must be 18 or older to register.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Hawker Center for Integrative Medicine - COVID Vaccine Clinic
info:
***We currently are providing the 1st and 2nd doses of MODERNA.***
Please sign up for an appointment time.  

When you arrive to the clinic, please continue to wear your face covering, practice physical distancing and wash your hands frequently to help reduce transmission.

Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. 
Expect to stay for 15 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction. 

Due to the limited supplies of vaccines provided to us each week, we are unable to take walk-ins, so please make an appointment. 

***Directions to the Hawker Center for Integrative Medicine:***
Our clinic is located in the Hidden Valley Office Complex.
1) When you arrive at the complex, take either driveway all the way to the back of the building.
2) We are located on the prominent corner at the very back of the building and we have our own private entrance.  Look for the parking lot with the number "2" in a big steel frame.  Do NOT go into the main building for we have a private entrance accessible directly from the parking lot. 
Look for our sign with our logo in the window and a door with the number "C-102" on it, visible from the parking lot.

*If you would like to find out more information about our clinic, please visit our website at www.hawkerhealth.com
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Eastside Integrated Primary Care - Covid Vaccine Site
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Arlington Airport Covid-19 Vaccine Site
info:
*************THIS IS A PFIZER CLINIC********** 

Everyone 12 and older in Washington is eligible for COVID-19 vaccination. 

Please also note that, even if you are otherwise eligible, you must be 18 or older for the Moderna or Johnson & Johnson vaccine, and 12 or older for the Pfizer vaccine (parent/guardian must be present to sign the consent form). 

Appointments are highly recommended but not required. Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. Expect to stay between 15-30 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction. Medical staff will be on hand. A mask must be worn at all times during the appointment, and please wear clothing with short or loose sleeves. 

****IF YOU ARE SCHEDULING YOUR 2ND DOSE APPOINTMENT, YOU MUST PROVIDE PROOF OF 1ST DOSE (example: vaccination card, medical record, myir.net immunization record)****
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
